subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Celtics never led and scored only 47 points through the first three quarters, yet they still nearly managed to steal Game 6 against the Knicks with a scintillating late run.
snippet: The Celtics never led and scored only 47 points through the first three quarters, yet they still nearly managed to steal Game 6 against the Knicks with a scintillating late run.
